body_html:
Yes, some new functions concerning sparse input (feature_colums) work in 1.2 but not in 1.0.

For usage examples (ie regression type),
which is outside of core TF, would it be possible to add at end of the script (maybe automatically) when the script is successfully run :
OS /Os version
TF version.
Pandas, numpy, scipy versions

We need to manage regular breaks with new API functions and need to run regression for each version and manage mutiple TF version at same time....

It becomes heavy to integrate recent features (but very useful).

Also having a roadmap over 1 year for API changes will really help for integration.

body:
Yes, some new functions concerning sparse input (feature_colums) work in 1.2 but not in 1.0.

For usage examples (ie regression type),
which is outside of core TF, would it be possible to add at end of the script (maybe automatically) when the script is successfully run :
OS /Os version
TF version.
Pandas, numpy, scipy versions

We need to manage regular breaks with new API functions and need to run regression for each version and manage mutiple TF version at same time....

It becomes heavy to integrate recent features (but very useful).


Also having a roadmap over 1 year for API changes will really help for integration.
